zone: Northern Bahr el Ghazal (شمال بحر الغزال)
circumstances: After landing at Aweil Airport, both tyres on the nose gear burst. The aircraft went out of control, veered off runway and collided with a building, bursting into flames. The aircraft was destroyed and all 7 crew and 13 passengers (Sudanese soldiers) were killed.
probable_cause: Loss of control upon landing after both tyres on the nose gear burst.
